title: Editor's Choice Pictures
text:
Pictures | Thu Apr 26, 2018 | 8:40am
Danusorn Sdisaithaworn, 10, poses for a portrait during an annual Poy Sang Long celebration, a traditional rite of passage for boys to be initiated as Buddhist novices, while he visits a relative's house outside Mae Hong Son, Thailand. REUTERS/Jorge... more Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 Danusorn Sdisaithaworn, 10, poses for a portrait during an annual Poy Sang Long celebration, a traditional rite of passage for boys to be initiated as Buddhist novices, while he visits a relative's house outside Mae Hong Son, Thailand. REUTERS/Jorge Silva Close 1 / 24
Former White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer poses next to a newly unveiled wax figure of first lady Melania Trump with a wax figure of her husband, President Donald Trump, at the Madame Tussauds in New York City, New York. REUTERS/Mike Segar Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 Former White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer poses next to a newly unveiled wax figure of first lady Melania Trump with a wax figure of her husband, President Donald Trump, at the Madame Tussauds in New York City, New York. REUTERS/Mike Segar Close 2 / 24
Parkland high school student activists arrive for the TIME 100 Gala in Manhattan, New York. REUTERS/Shannon Stapleton Reuters / Tuesday, April 24, 2018 Parkland high school student activists arrive for the TIME 100 Gala in Manhattan, New York. REUTERS/Shannon Stapleton Close 3 / 24
Models wait backstage before designer Lino Villaventura presents her REUTERS/Paulo Whitaker Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 Models wait backstage before designer Lino Villaventura presents her REUTERS/Paulo Whitaker Close 4 / 24
An Israeli border police officer pushes back a Palestinian journalist in Hebron, in the occupied West Bank. REUTERS/Mussa Qawasma Reuters / Thursday, April 26, 2018 An Israeli border police officer pushes back a Palestinian journalist in Hebron, in the occupied West Bank. REUTERS/Mussa Qawasma Close 5 / 24
French President Emmanuel Macron greets Senate Pages after addressing a joint session of Congress at the Capitol in Washington. REUTERS/Aaron P. Bernstein Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 French President Emmanuel Macron greets Senate Pages after addressing a joint session of Congress at the Capitol in Washington. REUTERS/Aaron P. Bernstein Close 6 / 24
Security personnel have lunch at the Auto China 2018 motor show in Beijing, China. REUTERS/Jason Lee Reuters / Thursday, April 26, 2018 Security personnel have lunch at the Auto China 2018 motor show in Beijing, China. REUTERS/Jason Lee Close 7 / 24
Britain's Queen Elizabeth, Colonel-in-Chief of the Royal Tank Regiment, poses for a photograph after presenting the regiment with their new standard in St George's Hall at Windsor Castle in Windsor, Britain. Steve Parsons/Pool via Reuters Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 Britain's Queen Elizabeth, Colonel-in-Chief of the Royal Tank Regiment, poses for a photograph after presenting the regiment with their new standard in St George's Hall at Windsor Castle in Windsor, Britain. Steve Parsons/Pool via Reuters Close 8 / 24
The submarine UC3 Nautilus is seen covered with green tarpaulin in Nordhavn, in Copenhagen, Denmark. Danish inventor Peter Madsen has been sentenced to life in prison for torturing and murdering Swedish journalist Kim Wall on his private submarine,... more Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 The submarine UC3 Nautilus is seen covered with green tarpaulin in Nordhavn, in Copenhagen, Denmark. Danish inventor Peter Madsen has been sentenced to life in prison for torturing and murdering Swedish journalist Kim Wall on his private submarine, it was also decided by the court that the submarine "UC3 Nautilus" must be confiscated. RITZAU SCANPIX/Mads Claus Rasmussen via REUTERS Close 9 / 24
Trash bags filled with shredded paper are pictured outside the former residence of the Russian consul general in Seattle, Washington. REUTERS/Jason Redmond Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 Trash bags filled with shredded paper are pictured outside the former residence of the Russian consul general in Seattle, Washington. REUTERS/Jason Redmond Close 10 / 24
Union members protest the proposed national minimum wage during a march in Durban, South Africa. REUTERS/Rogan Ward Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 Union members protest the proposed national minimum wage during a march in Durban, South Africa. REUTERS/Rogan Ward Close 11 / 24
Models present creations from the Salinas REUTERS/Paulo Whitaker Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 Models present creations from the Salinas REUTERS/Paulo Whitaker Close 12 / 24
The art work Flash Forward made of Lego bricks is pictured during the media preview of the exhibition The Art of the Brick: DC Super Heroes by U.S. artist Nathan Sawaya at Paris's Parc de la Villette in Paris, France. REUTERS/Benoit Tessier Reuters / Thursday, April 26, 2018 The art work Flash Forward made of Lego bricks is pictured during the media preview of the exhibition The Art of the Brick: DC Super Heroes by U.S. artist Nathan Sawaya at Paris's Parc de la Villette in Paris, France. REUTERS/Benoit Tessier Close 13 / 24
Bayern Munich's Franck Ribery is seen as a steward tackles a pitch invader after the match against Real Madrid in Munich, Germany. REUTERS/Kai Pfaffenbach Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 Bayern Munich's Franck Ribery is seen as a steward tackles a pitch invader after the match against Real Madrid in Munich, Germany. REUTERS/Kai Pfaffenbach Close 14 / 24
A protester breaks through a police line after a nine-year sentence was given to five men accused of the multiple rape of a woman during Pamplona's San Fermin festival in 2016, in Pamplona, Spain. REUTERS/Vincent West Reuters / Thursday, April 26, 2018 A protester breaks through a police line after a nine-year sentence was given to five men accused of the multiple rape of a woman during Pamplona's San Fermin festival in 2016, in Pamplona, Spain. REUTERS/Vincent West Close
Supporters of Armenian stage a rally Wednesday, April 25, 2018 Supporters of Armenian stage a rally
Durian vendors wait for customers at a market in Bangkok, Thailand. REUTERS/Athit Perawongmetha Reuters / Thursday, April 26, 2018 Durian vendors wait for customers at a market in Bangkok, Thailand. REUTERS/Athit Perawongmetha Close 17 / 24
A new transforming robot called "J-deite RIDE" that transforms itself into a passenger vehicle, developed by Brave Robotics Inc, Asratec Corp and Sansei Technologies Inc, is unveiled at a factory near Tokyo, Japan. REUTERS/Toru Hanai Reuters / Thursday, April 26, 2018 A new transforming robot called "J-deite RIDE" that transforms itself into a passenger vehicle, developed by Brave Robotics Inc, Asratec Corp and Sansei Technologies Inc, is unveiled at a factory near Tokyo, Japan. REUTERS/Toru Hanai Close 18 / 24
Protesters try to pull down the gates of the Legislative Yuan building during a rally against overhaul of the military and civil service pension funds in Taipei, Taiwan. REUTERS/Tyrone Siu Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 Protesters try to pull down the gates of the Legislative Yuan building during a rally against overhaul of the military and civil service pension funds in Taipei, Taiwan. REUTERS/Tyrone Siu Close 19 / 24
Syrian refugee and Olympic swimmer Yusra Mardini is pictured during a training session in a pool at the Olympic park in Berlin, Germany. REUTERS/Fabrizio Bensch Reuters / Thursday, April 26, 2018 Syrian refugee and Olympic swimmer Yusra Mardini is pictured during a training session in a pool at the Olympic park in Berlin, Germany. REUTERS/Fabrizio Bensch Close 20 / 24
A view shows a classroom of Orlando Garcia state primary school in Socopo, Venezuela. REUTERS/Carlos Eduardo Ramirez Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 A view shows a classroom of Orlando Garcia state primary school in Socopo, Venezuela. REUTERS/Carlos Eduardo Ramirez Close 21 / 24
New York Yankees left fielder Giancarlo Stanton takes the field for the seventh inning against the Minnesota Twins at Yankee Stadium in the Bronx, New York. Mandatory Credit: Brad Penner-USA TODAY Sports Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 New York Yankees left fielder Giancarlo Stanton takes the field for the seventh inning against the Minnesota Twins at Yankee Stadium in the Bronx, New York. Mandatory Credit: Brad Penner-USA TODAY Sports Close 22 / 24
The Eastern Express travels through Erzincan province en route from Ankara to Kars, Turkey. REUTERS/Umit Bektas Reuters / Thursday, April 26, 2018 The Eastern Express travels through Erzincan province en route from Ankara to Kars, Turkey. REUTERS/Umit Bektas Close 23 / 24
Policemen collect trash in the waters off the beach at the holiday island of Boracay during the first day of a temporary closure for tourists, in Philippines. REUTERS/Erik De Castro Reuters / Wednesday, April 25, 2018 Policemen collect trash in the waters off the beach at the holiday island of Boracay during the first day of a temporary closure for tourists, in Philippines. REUTERS/Erik De Castro Close
